item.title: My Emacs Org-Mode Document
item.description: org-mode keybindings 逗号(,) , s trees/subtrees 操作 key function description , s h org-premote-subtree 升级, h4 -> h3 , s l org-demote-subtree 降级, h3 -> h4 , s n org-narrow-to-subtree 定
